LanguageData.DisruptTheLinkFailedByRatkinAnomalyText: A mysterious force forcibly stabilized your link with the Dark, as if something was still unresolved...
LanguageData.DisruptedLinkTextSuccessText: The anomalous force that forcibly maintained the monolith and the Dark has dissipated, and the monolith can no longer withstand the pressure and collapses.
